avg_numerator.__comment: Get total story points of bugs, rolling 90 day window
avg_numerator.jql: project={{project}} AND issuetype=Bug AND updated > endOfDay(-90d)

avg_denominator.__comment: Get total story points of bugs and stories, rolling 90 day window
avg_denominator.jql: project={{project}} AND issuetype IN (Bug,Story) AND updated > endOfDay(-90d)
